description:
Valid second votes

Explanatory notes for the following statistics:
14111 General statistics of elections to the Bundestag
14121 Representative stat. of elections to the Bundestag

Definition:
In Bundestag elections, the second vote is marked on the
right half of the ballot paper (which is printed in blue).
The voter casts that vote for a specific party (Land list).
The first five candidates of the Land list are indicated
below the party name. The second vote decides on the
distribution of seats unless otherwise provided by the
Federal Elections Act (BWG). Only parties may submit Land
lists. The number of seats going to each party is determined
by the number of second votes cast for the party in the
federal territory or the Länder.
